approveHelp.en-US: Type $<approveSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` to approve the author of `$<messageOptionDescription>` in `$<channelOptionDescription>`
approveHelp.fr: Tape $<approveSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pour approuver l'auteur d'`$<messageOptionDescription>` dans `$<channelOptionDescription>`
approveHelp.pt-BR: Digite $<approveSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pra aprovar o autor de `$<messageOptionDescription>` em `$<channelOptionDescription>`

refuseHelp.en-US: Type $<refuseSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` to refuse the author of `$<messageOptionDescription>` in `$<channelOptionDescription>`
refuseHelp.fr: Tape $<refuseSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pour refuser l'auteur d'`$<messageOptionDescription>` dans `$<channelOptionDescription>`
refuseHelp.pt-BR: Digite $<refuseSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pra recusar o autor de `$<messageOptionDescription>` em `$<channelOptionDescription>`

noChannelReply.en-US: I do not know any channel with this tag.
noChannelReply.fr: Je ne connais aucun salon avec cette étiquette.
noChannelReply.pt-BR: Não conheço nenhum canal com essa marcação.

noMessageReply.en-US: I do not know any message with this identifier in this channel.
noMessageReply.fr: Je ne connais aucun message avec cet identifiant dans ce salon.
noMessageReply.pt-BR: Não sei nenhuma mensagem com essa identificação nesse canal.

noApprovePermissionReply.en-US: I do not have the rights to verify this member.
noApprovePermissionReply.fr: Je n'ai pas les droits pour vérifier ce membre.
noApprovePermissionReply.pt-BR: Eu não tenho as permissões pra verificar esse membro.

noRefusePermissionReply.en-US: I do not have the rights to unverify this member.
noRefusePermissionReply.fr: Je n'ai pas les droits pour dévérifier ce membre.
noRefusePermissionReply.pt-BR: Eu não tenho as permissões pra desverificar esse membro.
